201.comments: If you are unable to register in the course, please send an e-mail to the instructor at isaacson@apsc.ubc.ca, indicating the reason that you are unable to register.  Please provide your student number, your program details (university, program name, year level), a copy of your transcript to date, an indication of how you have met course prerequisites, and a rationale for your need to take the course.

description: Linear wave theory; wave shoaling, refraction and diffraction; random waves; wave generation; long waves, tides and currents; coastal structures; beaches and coasts; mixing processes; harbour and marinas; coastal modelling. Credit will only be given for one of CIVL 417 or CIVL 540.
